wikipedia_page.main: Doris M. Batter-Hatton (22 April 1929 – 23 April 2002) was a British sprinter. She competed in the women's 100 metres at the 1948 Summer Olympics. She married Leonard Hatton in 1951. She represented England and won a silver medal in the 660 yards relay at the 1950 British Empire Games in Auckland, New Zealand.
